item.title: Homelab
item.description: My personal homelab infrastructure project, running since January 2023. A space for experimentation, learning, and developing IT skills without professional constraints.

item.title: Uses
item.description: Here are the software and hardware I use or have used.

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Moncef, a software engineer who enjoys working across the entire spectrum of system building, from architecture and backend logic to frontend interfaces, infrastructure. I like understanding how everything fits together so I can design solutions that are reliable, maintainable, and aligned with real business needs.

I take projects from idea to production with a strong focus on clarity, testing, and automation, because these foundations help teams ship faster and with confidence.

Outside of work, I experiment in my homelab, contribute to open source, stay curious through constant reading, and share what I learn whenever it might help someone.
